summary: THE VEHICLE WAS INVOLVED IN A FRONTAL COLLISION WHILE TRAVELING 55 MPH.  THE DRIVER'S SHOULDER RESTRAINT DID NOT HOLD AND CAUSED  CONSUMER TO MOVE FORWARD AND HIT THE FRONT WINDSHIELD.   *NLM. ALSO, FRONT AIR BAGS FAILED TO DEPLOY.  *AK  THE DRIVER OF THE OTHER VEHICLE WAS KILLED IN THE CRASH.  THE CONSUMERS TRUCK T-BONED THE OTHER VEHICLE ON THE DRIVER'S SIDE.
